title: 3 Bedroom/1.5 Bath Updated, beautiful home for rent
posting_body: I have just recently taken a job out in New Jersey and have to relocate.
My home in West Dearborn is furnished and will be ready to rent by 8/10.
I am offering it furnished ONLY.
I am looking to rent it out for anywhere between 3 months to 1 year.
I have a hot tub which will be out of service unless you'd like to pay extra for the hot tub company to come out and maintain it.
Further, the backyard is completely fenced in.
I am open to allowing a dog.
Kitchen and bathrooms are all updated.
I will be including the wifi and water.
Neighbors and street are absolutely wonderful.
This would be a great fit for a single person, couple, or small family seeking something interim during a transition.
I am open to potentially renting long term, as well.
Please TEXT ME if you are interested.
I will be in town this weekend (8/5-8/9) and will be able to send pictures and/or host a tour upon request.
